body:
In preparation to pick up https://github.com/envoyproxy/envoy/pull/5486, I removed our buffer filter timeouts in favor of the http connection manager's request timeout. Thus far saw one instance of this:

```
[2019-01-09 22:56:57.549][000068][critical][backtrace] [bazel-out/k8-opt/bin/external/envoy/source/server/_virtual_includes/backtrace_lib/server/backtrace.h:125] Caught Segmentation fault, suspect faulting address 0x0
[2019-01-09 22:56:57.551][000068][critical] Backtrace (most recent call first) from thread 68:
  #1 Envoy::Network::ConnectionImpl::write(Envoy::Buffer::Instance&, bool) at connection_impl.cc:389
  #2 Envoy::Http::ConnectionManagerImpl::ActiveStream::encodeHeaders(Envoy::Http::ConnectionManagerImpl::ActiveStreamEncoderFilter*, Envoy::Http::HeaderMap&, bool) at conn_manager_impl.cc:1192

  #7 event_process_active_single_queue at event.c:1646
```
